name: Creepy Warehouse Game: The Game
description:
An unsettling stroll through a creepy box factory, while being stalked by a monster who's way too happy to see you. Find 8 pages and make it to the exit, try not to look at your stalker for too long or its game over.

Controls:

Move - WASD/Arrow keys

Look - Mouse

Jump - Spacebar

Interact - Left Mouse button

Pause - Escape (pause screen has button for exiting the game)
